statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Rift Valley coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${9.50} per pound with some Gazebo coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${14.50} per pound to create \displaystyle{80} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${14.31} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
